item.title: Recent Reading: John Eric Holmes
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• The Maze of Peril, by John Eric Holmes, copyright 1986; ISBN 0-917053-05-2.

    A fun jaunt through an early D&D adventure. Frog-men, were-sharks, and adventurers of dubious morals.

item.title: Recent Reading: Caitlin Kittredge
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Pure Blood, by Caitlin Kittredge, copyright 2008; ISBN 978-0-312-94830-6.

    The second Nocturne City novel.

item.title: Recent Reading: Jenn Bennett
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Summoning the Night, by Jenn Bennett, copyright 2012; ISBN 978-1-4516-2053-5.

    The second Arcadia Bell novel.

item.title: Recent Reading: Lucy A. Snyder
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Switchblade Goddess, by Lucy A. Snyder, copyright 2011; ISBN 978-0-345-51211-6.

    Third in a series.

item.title: Recent Reading: Brook, Powers, Wisdom
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• From the Guardian series:

    • Demon Night, by Meljean Brook; copyright 2008 by Melissa Kahn; ISBN 978-0-425-21977-5.

    • Demon Forged, by Meljean Brook; copyright 2009 by Melissa Kahn; ISBN 978-0-425-23041-1.

    The Guardian series consists of (at least) Demon Angel, Demon Moon, Demon Night, Demon Bound, and Demon Forged. (I haven't read Demon Bound yet.) Stories by Meljean Brook appear in (at least) the following anthologies: Hot Spell, Wild Thing, First Blood, and Must Love Hellhounds.

  • Hide Me Among the Graves, by Tim Powers, copyright 2012; ISBN 978-0-06-123154-4.

    Excellent. A sequel of sorts to The Stress of Her Regard.

  • From the Hex: series:

    • Demons are a Girl's Best Friend, by Linda Wisdom, copyright 2011; ISBN 978-1-4022-5439-0.

    • A Demon Does it Better, by Linda Wisdom, copyright 2012; ISBN 978-1-4022-3672.

    These are farther to the romance side of the “paranormal romance” genre than I generally prefer.

    The earlier books in the Hex series are 50 Ways to Hex Your Lover, Hex Appeal, Wicked by Any Other Name, and Hex in High Heels.

item.title: Recent Reading: K. Bennett
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Pay me in Flesh, by K. Bennett, copyright 2012; ISBN 978-0-7860-2624-1.

    A Mallory Caine, Zombie at Law novel. Amusing.

item.title: Recent Reading: Stacia Kane
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Sacrificial Magic, by Stacia Kane, copyright 2012 by Stacey Fackler; ISBN 978-0-345-52750-9.

    The fourth in the Downside Ghosts series, also known as the Chess Putnam series.

item.title: Recent Reading: Caitlin Kittredge
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• Daemon's Mark, by Caitlin Kittredge. A Nocturne City:series novel, featuring Insoli werewolf homicide detective Luna Wilder.

    The other books in the series are Night Life, Pure Blood, Second Skin, and Witch Craft.

    She has another series, Black London, which includes Street Magic and Demon Bound.

item.title: Recent Reading: N. K. Jemisin
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description:
• The Broken Kingdoms, by N. K. Jemisin, copyright 2010; ISBN 978-0-316-04396-0.

    The second book of The Inheritance Trilogy.
